project.name: soapworks-exampleproject
project.description:
A code example for how to use the soapworks library.
The submodules are: server: a sample server app that runs a web service. clientlib: the matching web service client library that uses soap/wsdl to connect to the server. clientapp: a sample client app that uses the clientlib to connect to the server.
To test it, run the Boot class and then execute the PingServiceImplTest.
